text: Can we use `{% import '../path/to/macros.html' as snippets %}` in modules? Because I am getting some weird, conflicting import loops whenever I use relative paths in the `module.html` file, but when I use the absolute path everything works.

this is the error I am getting in debug mode:
```TemplateError{severity=WARNING, reason=MISSING, item=TEMPLATE, message='Resolving path ../../coded_files/hubl/_snippets.html from parent template, use relative path from module instead', fieldName='path', lineno=8, startPosition=3, scopeDepth=2, category=MODULE_PATH_FALLBACK, categoryErrors={path=../../coded_files/hubl/_snippets.html}}```

Is it possible to define choice options in one Module choise that reference another?

IE: have a category module loop, want that to become an option (choice) for another module group loop?
